attributes.action: Bring all the troops home in the next 3 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am deeply upset that all of the military forces are still out in these countries. Fighting this war on terrorism. But the reason behind this war is the religion Islam. We allow these people to operate their extreme views. 

This thing called political correctness has gone too far. Let us listen to all minorites in the United Kingdom and not just one in paticular.  

I want the troops out of Afganistan and Iraq. Let us put a stop to more young life being taken away from their families. My own brother is joining up. Please answer my prayers and others out there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
